Package graphics

Class Simulator

java.lang.Object
graphics.Simulator
All Implemented Interfaces:
gui.Simulable, RobotArrivedOnFireEventListener, RobotNeedRefillEventListener
public class Simulator
extends java.lang.Object
implements gui.Simulable, RobotNeedRefillEventListener, RobotArrivedOnFireEventListener
Represent the simulation

    static int stepSizeInMs

    • isSimulationDone

      public boolean isSimulationDone()
      return true when the simulation is over. Simulation is over when all fires are extinguished.
      Returns:
      true if the simulation is over, false otherwise
